name: avpedee
description:
A game I made over the course of about a year (very on and off). Pretty dialogue heavy game. Quite long as well.

NOTE: The save/load doesnt work yet so don't close the game if you wanna keep playing (sry about this)

Synposis: Explore the lonely life of a college introvert... Who has a clear problem talking to people. Make friends with Stacy, Chad, Becky, Pepe the Frog, Coomer, Zoomer, Boomer and more! Make all your 4chin dreams come true!

Features 14 NPCs, around 60 or so cutscenes, and 7 unique (shitty) soundtracks that I made

Controls:

Press H to toggle score bars

Press E to interact with things

Spacebar to advance dialogue
